cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to a negative value will cause configuration validation errors and prevent proper SCTP stream initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to a negative value will cause configuration validation errors and prevent proper SCTP stream initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SCTP_INSTREAMS 設定為負值會導致配置驗證錯誤，並阻止正確的 SCTP 流初始化。
